TopicTitle: Is it possible to import KSP parts into Blender?

Articles.Content:
I am assuming most of you have read some or all of the "Grand Tour: Voyage to the Planets" thread in the Fan Works section. I want to make it into a movie.

Yep, you read that right. A movie.

I need to get the parts. Does anyone have them, or know how to get them?
Nope, but if you find out, please let me know.
Try talking to a forumer named Deadweasel. He's done some impresive scenes in his KSP saga by ripping models from the game.
